name: MOLC's Daily Life of S.P.R.I.T.E.S.
description:
After a long and perilous journey you've finally arrived at the City of FUK. You have a whole heap of opportunities to explore, thousands of stories to hear and an entire city's population of S.P.R.I.T.E.S. to meet!

Choose your backstory, your playstyle and venture into the city of FUK! Meet new people, discover new opportunities and story-lines you can partake in, get a job, explore new hobbies, you can do pretty much all you want in this city. But keep in mind, time isn't just a concept. S.P.R.I.T.E.S. have their own lives and they will go on with their day even if you do not interfere. This city is alive!

Key Features

  • Meet Hundereds of S.P.R.I.T.E.S. and Learn About Their Lives :

    There are thousands of stories to uncover in the world of S.P.R.I.T.E.S. May it be the owner of a bar you frequent, the homeless guy that asks you for money every morning or one of your 50 co-workers, everyone has their own stories.

  • Develop new relationships: As you meet new S.P.R.I.T.E.S. you can become friends, acquaintances or lovers. Or if that's not your cup of tea just antagonize everyone you meet!

  • Become a part of the city: The city and its inhabitants will notice you as time goes on. As a newcomer in the city you won't know anyone but as time goes on people may notice you more and more.

  • You can do whatever you want:

    Want to Become a detective? Work as a bartender? Improve your lifestyle? Sell drugs? Have a family? There are no paths in this game, only an open expanse in which you are free to do whatever you desire.

  • Customize everything: Buy houses, make investments, wear expensive watches or eat the best food in town every day and night. As you earn more and more money you will be able to customize just about anything you want. Move up in the world or enjoy the simple pleasure in life...

  • Learn about the city: As you live your life in the city of F.U.K. you'll inevitably learn more of it but if you wish to find out more and get into the depths of this mysterious cities lore, quite the adventure awaits you.

  • Play your way: This game doesn't have an ending, there are many story arcs in it and deep complex gameplay mechanics that offer long hours of playtime which you are free to do what you wish with.

Launch Content

At Launch you will be able to access a variety of story paths, but as time goes on, new opportunities will be added to explore. All new content will be free updates. Though the early access may not be the most polished experience, you will be able to partake in the development process. Any and every wish of our community is important to us and we want this game to be an experience everyone can enjoy. Follow our game to see our road-map reveal soon!
